text: Motion
Motion

Good morning, everyone.
Seems like there's quite some excitement.

Yeah! We were discussing the
theme for the unit live~!

For me, I'd like to try something like "flowers" or
"stylish cafes"! What about you, Chiyuki-san?

I haven't come up with any ideas yet.
I just have some notes on my phone.
Aww, I wanna see, I wanna see~!
T-Tenka too...!
Oh come on~, it's still a secret♪

Haha,
did you come up with anything, Tenka?

Well...
Tenka...

...And they lived...
happily ever after...
Like a fairy tale ending...!
Wow, what a lovely theme.

I think it's amazing!
You're incredible, Tenka-chan!

Hehe...
I had a dream like a picture book yesterday, so...

A "happily ever after", huh...
I wonder what kind of stage it'll be.

Oh... um...
what kind of...?

Amana might have a fairy tale-like image! Using
smoke and bubbles to create a fantastical atmosphere☆

I think I'll structure it like a story...
and end with a happily ever after.

Wow...!
Y-You two are amazing... It sounds great!

...That sounds good.
Let's try fleshing that out.
